title: How hard is it to write a thesis? - Quora

response.answer_text: Correctly written abstracts reveal the purpose of your document, thereby serving as a means of monitoring the functional purpose of the provisions of the document and its structure as a whole. Without good theses, your arguments may seem weak, not relevant and uninteresting to readers. http://writingeek.com/dissertation-services.html know how to write correctly the theses: each thesis is limited to 1-2 sentences and correctly arranged in the text. Keep statements in the theses focused on the topic. You have to cover a single issue in exceptional detail so that your statements are firmly grounded in the very content of the document.
